evidence.description: Automated extraction via scripts/extract_bsp_mmio_registers.py from BSP headers in docs/vendor/N32901-3_NonOS_BSP/. Output file: research/findings/n32903_registers.json (9616 lines, 1544 register definitions).

next_steps: Import register map into Ghidra as Memory Map labels
Create C structs for USB/GPIO/ADC peripherals
Apply structs to decompiler for improved readability
summary: Extracted 1544 hardware register definitions from N32901-3 NonOS BSP headers. Key peripherals: USB_BA=0xB1008000, GPIO_BA=0xB8001000, ADC_BA=0xB800E000, TMR_BA=0xB8002000, SPI0_BA=0xB800C000. Register map stored in research/findings/n32903_registers.json for Ghidra import.
title: N32903 MMIO Register Map Extracted from BSP
